yaak.agent.event
Class AgentContextEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      yaak.agent.event.AgentEvent
          yaak.agent.event.AgentContextEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AgentContextEvent
extends AgentEvent

AgentContextEvent provides infomation for objects that register for AgentContextListener-related agent life-cycle operations.

Version:
$Id: AgentContextEvent.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith

Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

AgentContextEvent

public AgentContextEvent(int eventID,
                         java.lang.Object source,
                         Agent agent,
                         AgentID aid)

Encapsulates event information for objects that register as context listeners.

Parameters:
eventID - The type of event, for example, an AGENT_CREATED operation.
source - The source object (agent context) for the event.
agent - The agent.
aid - The agent ID.
Method Detail

getAgentID

public AgentID getAgentID()

Provides access to the associated agent ID.

Returns:
A copy of the agent ID (not null following a disposal).
